description: This header file provides utility functions for reading properties and file contents, checking file types, searching files and directories with regex patterns and exclusions, and expanding properties within strings. It appears to be part of a larger codebase related to processing configuration files or similar data sources.

methods.name: bool readPropertyFromFile(const char * filename,const string & property,string & propertyValue)
methods.description: Reads a property value from a specified file, supporting recursive expansion if the property value starts with '$'.

methods.name: bool readFileContent(const char * filename,string & content)
methods.description: Reads the entire content of a file into a string.

methods.name: bool isRegularFile(const string & path)
methods.description: Checks whether the provided path corresponds to a regular file.

methods.name: bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Recursively searches for files matching pattern, respecting exclusions, and appends matching file paths to the result string, with a cap at 10 results.

methods.name: bool searchFiles(string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Initiates a filename search with depth limits and exclusions, calling the recursive helper.

methods.name: bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char * input,const char * filePath,string & expandedString)
methods.description: Processes a string containing variables marked with '$' and replaces them with values read from a property file.
